entry.title: $2610 // **NO FEE** Gorgeous 1 Bedroom in Prime Chelsea Location
entry.content:
Rent quoted is a "NET EFFECTIVE" rent based on a 12 month year lease. We are offering 1 month free available to fully qualified applicants, having good unblemished credit and existing annual income equal to or exceeding 40x' the monthly rent. Available for immediate lease start. Net effective rental amount is based on a stated lease monthly rent of $2850.

Beautifully renovated 1 bedroom on the second floor of charming walk up building. Kitchen includes dishwasher and built in microwave. Marble bathroom.

Short walk to Union Square, High Line, Chelsea Market, and Hudson River Park. Short commute to NYU, SVA, New School, and FIT. Conveniently located near the A, C, E, B, D, F, M, L, and Path trains

Pet friendly building. Full time live in super. Laundry in building. Apartment offered directly from Landlord so NO BROKERS FEES!

Showing Times:
Monday-Friday 9am-6pm
Weekends email for appointment

If interested please contact Desi at show contact info
